content:
# The Stone Furnace currently has 6 units of Copper Ore and has successfully produced 1 Copper Plate. 
# The furnace is still in a working state, indicating that it is processing the Copper Ore.

# Since the furnace is working, I will wait for a maximum of 30 seconds to see if it can produce more Copper Plates from the remaining Copper Ore.
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= 2:  # Check if at least 2 Copper Plates have been produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After the waiting period, I will check my inventory to confirm the number of Copper Plates produced.
print(f"Inventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking the inventory after waiting for smelting to complete.
